hero.title: Madrimov Xudoshukur
hero.desc: Hello, I'm a Front-end developer in Uzbekistan

bio.info: I graduated from Khiva College of Tourism, Hotel and Restaurant Manager
I worked as a frontend developer at Khiva IT Center, taught programming in addition to programming
I joined the developer team of IDeapGroup as a frontend developer, I have been participating in many startups in this team and created the UI part of web applications
I joined "Data Learning Station" as a front-end programming mentor, where I have been teaching kids basic programming skills.
I am participating in a startup project, This startup is focused on the right learning assessment system (LMS).
